attributes.action: Make it easier to get employment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that there be less rules to get a job.  The requirements take too many months to go through before a position can be filled.  Such as Social Work.  This causes too many vacancies.  Too much unemployment for those waiting to get a job.  Too much burdon on benefits.
Too much danger for unhelped clients who can only get agancy assistance.
Barbara Ross - Social Scientist - 
Harmony Care Markets
